text1: Early US Light tank, has 2 Small slots and a built-in hull 30cal.
Early US Medium tank, has 1 Medium slot and 4 built-in hull 30cals.
Mid to Late US Medium tank, has 1 Large slot, a built-in pintle 50cal, and a built-in hull 30cal.
Late US Medium-Heavy tank, an overall upgrade to the Sherman's armor at the cost of mobility.
General purpose supply truck, transport 3 Squads of "Fighter" wings.
A more purposeful modification of the supply truck to carry fuel over people.
Standard M2a2 turret, equipped with a 50cal HMG.
Non-standard modified M2 turret, equipped with quad 50cal HMGs.
Non-standard modified M2a2, equipped with dual 50cal HMGs.
Standard M2a2 turret, equipped with a 30cal LMG.
Standard M2-M3 turret, equipped with a 37mm.
Standard M4 Sherman turret, equipped with a 75mm.
Standard Hull 30cal, you might see this for many built-in weapons.
